ModMetaData.name: RimJournal
ModMetaData.author: "Rapid Spade"
ModMetaData.description:
Want more storytelling out of your game? Want to write about your colonists' miserable lives? Do it then, with RimJournal! 
Adds an in-game journal for all your creative writing needs. Create, save, load, and delete your journal entries. 
Should be fully compatible with other mods. 
Should be safe to add to existing saves. 
Requirements: 
- None
